# 紫微四化

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/ziwei-sihua
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/ziwei-sihua
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install ziwei-sihua
ziwei-sihua <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g ziwei-sihua
ziwei-sihua <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
